00009 bool MovingGrating::init()
00010 {
00011            bool returnvalue = true;
00012 
00013            if( !getParam("period", period) ) returnvalue = false;
00014            if( !getParam("speed",  speed) ) returnvalue = false;
00015            if( !getParam("angle", angle) ) returnvalue = false;
00016 
00017            totalTranslation = 0;
00018 
00019            if (returnvalue)
00020             setupGrid( -800, -800, 1, 1600, 1600, 1 );
00021            else 
00022             Error() <<  "Some parameter values could not be read";
00023         
00024            return returnvalue;    
00025 }

00027 void MovingGrating::drawFrame()
00028 {
00029         glClear( GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT );
00030 
00031            //glRotatef( 2.0, 0.0, 0.0, 1.0 );
00032            if( totalTranslation > period ){
00033                       //glTranslatef( speed-period, 0.0, 0.0 );
00034                       totalTranslation = totalTranslation - period + speed;
00035            }
00036            else{
00037                       //glTranslatef( speed, 0.0, 0.0 );
00038                       totalTranslation = totalTranslation + speed;
00039            }
00040            for( int i=0; i<1600; i++ )
00041                       setGrayLevel( i,0,0.5+0.5*sin(2*3.14159*(i+totalTranslation)/period) );
00042 
00043            glRotatef( angle, 0.0, 0.0, 1.0 );
00044 
00045            drawGrid();
00046 
00047            glRotatef( -angle, 0.0, 0.0, 1.0 );
00048 
00049            //if( framecount%2 == 0 ) pulse = true;
00050            //else pulse = false;
00051 }
